description: Application to clear condition 3 (Materials), 4 (Construction Logistics Plan), 6 (Landscaping), 8 (Energy Statement), 9 (Water Efficiency Calculator), 18 (Boundary Treatment) of approved application DM2024/01763.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: ART4 Article 4 Direction - Boroughwide HMO Restriction

PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2024/01164--- Address: 33 Clarendon Road And 26 Elgin RoadWallingtonSM6 8QX--- Proposal: Demolition of the existing garages and erection of two attached three storey dwellings with accommodation at basement level, provision of private and shared amenity spaces via balconies and roof terraces, refuse and cycle stores, car parking spaces, hard and soft landscaping and reduction in width of the vehicular access to and from Elgin Road. Erection of a two storey side extension, a part one, part two storey rear extension at basement and ground floor level, basement extension, increase of roof height including conversion of loft space involving dormer extensions to front and rear and rooflights to front and flank roofslopes and alterations to front, rear and flank fenestrations to provide seven self contained residential units.--- Status: WDN--- Decision: WDN--- Date Decision Issued: 29-APR-25---

PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2024/01763--- Address: 33 Clarendon Road And 26 Elgin RoadWallingtonSM6 8QX--- Proposal: Demolition of existing garages and erection of two attached three storey dwellings with accommodation at basement and loft levels and erection of a three storey side extension at lower ground, ground and first floor level, a part one, part two storey rear extension at basement and ground level, alterations to front, rear and flank fenestrations and increase in roof height including conversion of loft space involving dormer extensions to front, side and rear and rooflights to front and flank roofslopes to provide seven self contained residential units. Provision of private and shared amenity spaces, refuse and cycle stores, car parking spaces, associated landscaping and reduction in width of the vehicular access to and from Elgin Road.--- Status: GTD--- Decision: GTD--- Date Decision Issued: 03-APR-25---
